message: I'm offering you a fair $4000 - considering the 20% depreciation you face each round, it's better to accept now than to counter-offer.
I'm proposing a fairer split, taking into account the depreciation you face.  Accept this and we both get a better deal than rejecting and facing further losses.
Bob, the money has already lost 40% of its value for you, but only 10% for me. This $3500 now is worth more than a higher amount in future rounds. This is your best move.
